Entre los diversos oficios se ha desarrollado más en la agricultura, ganadería y en la venta de comida, en la que actualmente lo realiza de manera ambulante, valiéndose de una pequeña carpa, una mesa con bancas para que puedan sus clientes acomodarse y consumir lo que ella prepara. En este negocio sus hijos la apoyan, atendiendo a los clientes. Es así como transcurren sus días, durante la mañana expende comida y en las tardes alimentan a sus animales; pero en época de cosecha es toda la familia que comparte esta actividad y tratan de recolectar lo cosechado. Es su crédito número 13 que tiene con MFP,  esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal porque le ha permitido mejorar e implementar sus actividades de las cuales esta muy agradecida, una vez mas se compromete a ser responsable en sus pagos y colaborar activamente en lo que necesite su grupo. Con el crédito que solicite, podrá comprar  productos no perecibles como arroz, azúcar, menestras y cereales al por mayor.
texts.en: Teofila is 42 years old and she lives in a house which she owns, together with her husband and their 3 children. she considers herself to be a multidimensional woman. She has taken on various occupations throughout her life, until finally she found the best business for her family. Among the various occupations she has had, the ones she developed the most are agriculture, farming, and catering. She currently sells foods itinerantly. She equips herself with a small awning and with a table and chairs so that her clients can make themselves comfortable while they enjoy the foods which she prepared. Her children help her with her business in attending to the customers. This is how she passes her days: during the morning she sells her foods and in the afternoons she feeds her livestock. But during the harvest season the entire family partakes in the activity to try to collect the products. This is her 13th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy to be part of her communal bank because it has helped her to improve and implement her business activities. And for this she is very thankful. Once again she commits herself to being responsible with her payments and to actively collaborate with her group. With the loan she requests she will purchase non-perishable products, such as rice, sugar, beans, and cereal grains in wholesale.

loans.use: to supply her business with the purchase of rice, sugar, beans, and cereal grains in wholesale.

loans.name: Willy

texts.es: El señor Willy es chofer independiente y trabaja con su minibús en transporte de pasajeros. El crédito lo requiere para comprar repuestos para su vehiculo y el cambio de llantas. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma esta ubicada en la zona de Mariscal Sucre en la ciudad de El Alto;  es casado y tiene tres hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su préstamo es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Willy is an independent driver and he works with a passenger mini-bus. He needs a loan to purchase spare parts for his vehicle and to purchase new tires. He lives in his parents' house and it is located in the region of Mariscal Sucre in the city of El Alto. He is married and he has 3 children. This is the second time he has accessed a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and new tires for his minibus.

loans.name: Sinceridad Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Sinceridad inicia su ciclo numero 6 con 16 socias, las cuales se dedican a diferentes negocios como la venta D. abarrotes en general, salón D. belleza, lapidas en piedra D. Huamanga, elaboración D. molidos y venta D. papa seca.
Maximiliana es la presidenta del banco Comunal en el presente ciclo, tiene 62 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Maximiliana y su esposo tienen una carpintería donD. elaboran puertas, ventanas, pasamanos, roperos reposteros, etc. Maximiliana solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra D. madera, está en FINCA Perú desD. hace cuatro ciclos, ingresó por la invitación D. la promotora, le gusta su Banco Comunal porque aprenD. muchas cosas y pueD. ahorrar, pasa momentos gratos con sus compañeras.
Esta ahorrando para que pueda viajar al Argentina, pues ahí se encuentra su hija.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Sinceridad" is starting their 6th loan cycle. There are 16 members and they all have different businesses, including general grocery store, beauty salon, Huamanga gravestones, milling services, and dried potato sales. 

Maximiliana is the president of the communal bank for the current loan cycle. She is 62 years old, married and she has 4 children. Maximiliana and her husband have a carpentry business where they make doors, windows, railings, dressers, hutches, etc. Maximiliana requests a loan to invest in the purchase of wood. She has been with Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) for the past four loan cycles. She joined following an invitation by a promoter. She appreciates her communal bank because she learns many things and she is able to save money. She enjoys some pleasant moments with her colleagues.

She is saving money to travel to Argentina to visit her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase wood for her carpentry shop.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime de 38 años de edad, soltero vive en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope y a unos 40 minutos del departamento de Lambayeque.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla Jaime es la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), desde hace 4 años, el lugar donde cría  sus animales en la parte posterior de su casa , los alimenta con comida balanceada  y pastos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados de la ciudad de Piura.  Esto le permite obtener mayores ganancias para cubrir sus gastos diarios.   También trabaja en el área agrícola en otros tierras.

Jaime solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento para los mismos, ya que por falta de lluvias los pastos están escasos, lo que le permitirá tenerlos bien alimentados  para venderlos a un mejor precio.  Jaime es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora que con empeño a sabido salir adelante en la vida para mejorar.
texts.en:
Jaime is 38 years old. He is single and he lives in his own house, equipped with running water and electricity, in the Mórrope district, approximately 40 minutes away from the Lambayeque department. In these areas people engage in agriculture, breeding and craftsmanship.

Jaime breeds sheep, an activity he has been running for 4 years. He breeds his animals at the back of his house, feeding them both with animal feed and in natural pastures. Once they have reached the ideal size and weight he sells them in the various markets of the town of Piura. Getting the best incomes in this way, he is able to pay for his daily expenses. He also engages in agriculture in other people’s lands.

Jaime asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 PEN to buy more animals and their feed because, grass having become scarce for the lack of rain, he needs to keep them well fed to then sell them at a better price. Jaime is a very well-known member of his community because he is a responsible and extremely hardworking man who has been able to progress in life thanks to his determination.

loans.use: To buy more sheep and sheep feed.

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es: El señor Agustín es productor lechero y también desempeña el trabajo de albañil y su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrícolas. Estas actividades son su principal fuente de ingresos. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una vaca lechera para mejorar sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Achacachi del departamento de La Paz; es casado y tiene tres hijos. EL cliente con el crédito anterior pudo aumentar el ganado que tenia por lo cual se encuentra muy satisfecho y ahora pretende mejorar mucho más su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Agustin is a milk farmer and he also works as a construction contractor. His wife helps her with the agricultural activities. These businesses are their primary source of income. He requires the loan to purchase a dairy cow to improve their earnings. He lives in a house which he owns and it is located in the community of Achacachi in the department of La Paz. He is married and he has three children. With his previous loan he was able to increase his herd, for which is very satisfied. He now plans on improving significantly his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to increase milk production.

loans.name: Pamela Lizet

texts.es:
Pamela es una madre de familia de 22 años de edad, viven en su casa propia con su menor hijo de 4 años, la cual cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Patapo a 30 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona desarrolla la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Pamela se dedica hace 2 años a la venta de artículos de piñatería (globos, piñatas, platos, cucharas y vasos de plástico,etc.), el negocio que tiene lo ha colocado en su casa para comodidad y seguridad de Pamela, la venta de todos estos artículos le ayuda a incrementar los ingresos , ya que es una actividad que pocas personas la tienen. Lo que le va a permitir tener un mejor nivelde vida  en su hogar.

Al ver que su negocio va creciendo a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para implementar su negocio con mercadería innovadora y así su clientela aumente, ya que su objetivo final es tener un negocio que se encargue desde la decoración hasta la comida para  todo tipo de eventos,lo que le va a permitir cubrir el crédito y brindarle una mejor oportunidad a su hijo.
texts.en:
Pamela is a 22-year-old mother who lives in her own house with her 4-year-old son. Her house, equipped with running water, is located in the Patapo district, 30 minutes from the Chiclayo province, an area whose inhabitants engage in agriculture and animal breeding activities.

For 2 years Pamela has been engaging in selling party supplies (balloons, piñatas, plastic dishes, spoons and glasses among other things). For her own safety and convenience, she has established her shop in her own house. Selling these products helps her increasing her income and it will help herself and her family achieving a better standard of living, as this is an activity very few people engage in.

As her activity continues growing, she has asked Edyme Alternativa for a loan of 800 PEN to supply her shop with innovative products to increase the number of her customers. Her final goal is to succeed in taking care of every aspect of events organization (from decoration to catering), because in this way she will be able to pay for her loan and to offer better opportunities to her son.

loans.use: To buy innovative products for her shop.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El señor Antonio es empleado, trabaja en la empresa ENFE  y su esposa es artesana; ella se dedica a tejer mantas y las comercializa los días jueves y domingos en la feria 16 de julio de la ciudad de El Alto. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de lanas de diversos colores y texturas para que su esposa pueda continuar con el negocio de tejer mantas. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de  Villa Ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto; es casado, tiene cuatro hijos. Es primer crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Antonio is employed and he works at the ENFE company. His wife is an artisan. She knights blankets and she sells them on Thursdays and Sundays at the 16 de Julio fair in the city of El Alto. He require a loan to purchase wool yarn in various colors and textures for his wife to continue with her business and to make more blankets. He lives in a house which they own and it is located in the region of Villa Ingenio in the city of El Alto. They have four children. This is his first loan with Impro (Kiva Field Partner) and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase wool yarn of different colors and texture for his wife to continue with her business knitting blankets.

loans.name: Nuevo Día Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Día, inicia su ciclo número 11 con 10 socias, las cuales se dedican a la venta de artesanías, papa seca, cosméticos por catálogo, leña, cereales. 
Erica, es la presidenta para éste ciclo, tiene 30 años es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 7 años. Erica se dedica a la venta de golosina y desayuno frente a la Universidad Alas Peruanas. Solicita un préstamo y lo invertirá en la implementación de su negocio. Antes trabajaba en una imprenta que está frente a la universidad y se dio cuenta que los estudiantes cuando salían no tenían donde tomar su desayuno y que se compraban gaseosas y galletas y decidió ella vender desayuno y golosinas está con éste negocio hace un año y le va bien. 
Su sueño es poder ahorrar para comprar maquinarias e implementar su imprenta.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Nuevo Dia" is on their 11th loan cycle. Its 10 members have businesses, including crafts sales, dried potato sales, cosmetics sales by catalogue, firewood sales, and cereal grain sales.

Erica is the president of the group for this loan cycle. She is 30 years old and she is a single mother of a 7-year old boy. Erica sells sweets and breakfast in front of the University of Alas Peruanas. She requests a loan to invest in the implementation of her business. Previously she worked at a printing company, located near the university. She noticed that students had nowhere to have their breakfast when they were on break, buying only soft drinks and cookies. So she decided to start selling breakfast and sweets. She has been in business for a year and it is going very well. 

Her dream is to save enough money to purchase printers to set up a print shop.

loans.use: to purchase disposable plates and utensils for her breakfast foods business.

loans.name: Leontine

texts.en:
Leontine is 34 years old. She has six children who are 5 to 14 years old. They are all in school. Her husband sells goats. 

She owns a general store in which she sells water, rice, soap, pens, sugar and salt. She has done this business for 15 years. This business has enabled her pay school fees for her children. 

She is requesting a loan to buy some items to put in her store such as rice, sugar and salt. With the profits she plans to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy some items such as rice, sugar, salt, etc., for resale.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
María  D. 52 años D. edad, tiene casa propia que vive con su esposo no tiene hijos, la cual no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en el distrito D. TambogranD. 40 minutos a proximadamente del departamento D. Piura.  Zona dedicada a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

María labora vendiendo gasolina en galoneras y botellas D. plástico para el uso D. unidades móviles pequeñas (motos lineales y mototaxis), ya que en estas zonas no existen los grifos,  esta actividad a la que se dedica es un negocio próspero donD. sus ingresos se han incrementado progresivamente, ésto le va permitir solventar todos sus gastos y necesidades D. su casa.  Otra actividad que realiza es la crianza y venta D. aves D. corral,que una vez que están ensu crecimeinto ideal los venD. en el mercado D. su distrito.

Por eso a creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo D. Edpyme Alternativa D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. gasolina, para abastecer a su clientela que a ido aumentando y también para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales, sus ganacias van ayudar a que pueda pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. ella y la D. su esposo.
texts.en:
María, 52, lives in her own house with her husband.  She has no children.  The house does not have basic utilities and is located in the district of TambogranD., approximately 40 minutes from the department of Piura.  This area is involved in agriculture, livestock farming and crafts.

María sells gas in gallon jugs and plastic bottles for small motor vehicles (motorcycles and mototaxis), since there are no pumps in these areas.  Her business is prosperous and income has increased progressively, enabling her to cover household expenses.  She also raises chickens and sells them at the district market.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy more volume of gasoline to supply to her customers since demand has increased.  She also wants to buy balanced animal feed.  Her earnings will help pay back the loan and improve her and her husband's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more gasoline and balanced animal feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Nueva Imagen De Tula Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "NUEVA IMAGEN DE TULA", porque las señoras dicen que la imagen de la primera es con la que todos se quedan, pero tambien te puedes equivocar y cambiar. Esta hubicado en el Estado de Hidalgo la cual es conocida como la ciudad de las atlantes que costrullo la cultura Tolteca, la señora Maria Concepcion Hernande vende cosmeticos desde hace 5 años, tiene 59 años de edad, es una señora que le gusta trabajar y salir adelante por cualquier medio, las personas la tienen en un concepto de una muy buena persona, honesta y siempre entrega todo lo que les piden a tiempo. Ella desea este prestamo para invertir en su negocio y así apoyar en los gastos de su hogar y con las ganancias expandir su producto para que todas las personas la conozcan y sea una de las mejores vendedoras.
texts.en: The group is called "Nueva Imagen de Tula" because the members said that the first impression is the one that lasts, but one can always be wrong and change. It is located in the state of Hidalgo, which is known as the city of Atlantes which was built by the Toltecs. Maria Concepcion Hernade has been selling cosmetics for the past 5 years. She is 59 years old and she is someone who enjoys to work and to keep moving forward in whatever way possible. People know her as a very good person, honest, and always ready to provide what they need on time. She wants this loan to invest in her business and to cover the household expenses. With the earnings she wants to distribute her products in farther territories so that everyone will know her and to become one of the best merchants.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Helene

texts.en:
Helene is 65 years old. She has eight children who are ages 6 to 47 years old. They have all been to school. 

She sells green bananas and traditionally made alcohol and she is also a farmer. This business has enabled her to pay garden employees and meet the needs of her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more green bananas and some other type of bananas used to make alcohol. With the profits she plans to feed her children and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy bananas.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es  soltera de 41 años de edad, vive en su casa propia sola, la cual cuenta con el servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el caserío Sialupe Baca a una hora aproximadamente del departamento de Lambayeque.   Zona que desarrolla la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y artesana.

Isabel se dedica a la comercialización de chicha de jora (bebida realizada a base de maíz molido que lo dejan fermentar y luego le colocan otros insumos y está lista para consumirla), lo  prepara en su mismo domicilio y los deja fermentar en unas vasijas de cerámica, actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años, ya que por costumbre esta receta pasa de generación en generación en esa zona, luego lo ofrece a sus clientes que la conocen, de esta manera ella se ayuda a tener más ingresos económicos para poder solventar sus gastos diarios.  Otra actividad que realiza es la crianza y venta de aves de corral.

A solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos para seguir elaborando la chicha de jora que vende, los pedidos  que le hacen le permite tener mayores ganancias, ya que su clientela se ha incrementado considerablemente,  para poder pagar su  crédito y de paso mejorar la calidad de vida de ella.  Isabel desea que más adelante su negocio crezca y así pueda tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Isabel, 41, is single and lives alone in her own house which only has electricity.  It is located in the Sialupe Baca rural area, approximately one hour from the department of Lambayeque.  The main activities in this area are agriculture, livestock farming and crafts.

Isabel sells "chicha de jora" (a drink made with fermented ground maize and other ingredients).  She makes it at home and lets it ferment in ceramic pots.  She has been in business for 10 years and uses a recipe passed down through generations in the area.  She sells to customers who know her and earns an income to cover her daily household expenses.  She also raises and sells chickens.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy ingredients to make the chica de jora that she sells.  Demand has increased considerably and the orders will give her greater earnings to pay back the loan and improve her lifestyle.  Isabel wants her business to grow into something much bigger.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make "chicha de jora" drink.

loans.name: Virginie

texts.en:
Virginie is 31 years old. She has four children who are between the ages of 17 years and 3 months. Two are in school while the others are not yet school age. Her husband is a farmer.

Virgnie sells cooking oil and  vegetables such as tomatoes and cabbages. Selling food has enabled her to feed her family and pay the house rent. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more food such as green bananas, beans and tomatoes to sell. With the profits she wishes to start a garden

loans.use: to buy food such as tomatoes, beans and green bananas for resale.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José de 42 años de edad, vive con su esposa en su casa propia  que cuenta con servicio de agua y  luz, ubicado en el distrito de Mórrope  y a una hora del departamento de Lambayeque.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla José  es la crianza y venta de  aves de corral (pollos, gallinas y patos), desde hace varios años, el lugar donde cría  sus animales está en la parte posterior de la casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada  y granos naturales, una vez que tengan el tamaño y el peso ideal los oferta en los distintos mercados, ya que cuenta con su propia clientela en la ciudad de Lambayeque y Chiclayo.  Esto le permite obtener mayores ganancias para cubrir sus gastos diarios. 

José  solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más aves de corral y acomodar el corral donde viven sus animales, esto les permitirá estar cómodos y bien alimentados  para posteriormente ofertarlos a un buen precio en los mercados.  José es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque siempre se preocupa en que su negocio crezca cada día más, para poder pagar su préstamo y poder tener un desarrollo o una mejoría en su vida personal.
texts.en:
José, 42, lives with his wife in his own house which has running water and electricity.  It is located in the district of Mórrope, an hour from the department of Lambayeque.  In these areas the main activities are agriculture, livestock farming and crafts.

José has been raising and selling chickens, hens and ducks for several years.  He does this in a farmyard behind his house.  He gives them balanced feed and natural grains, and once they are ready for market, sells them to customers in the cities of Lambayeque and Chiclayo.  This provides him with ample income to cover his daily expenses.

José has requested a loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy more chickens and to improve the farmyard where they live.  This will make them more comfortable and better fed so they can be sold for a good price at market.  José is very well-known in the area because he takes care to develop his business more and more each day so he can pay back the loan and lead a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed and improve his chicken farmyard.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers to use in his banana farming gardens.

loans.name: Swayibu

texts.en:
Swayibu is 25 years old he has five children who are between the ages of 9 and 23 years old. They are all in school.

Swayibu sells food such as sugar, rice and cooking oil. He has done this business for five years. He is requesting a loan to buy more food such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, etc. With the profits he plans to buy more food and make more profits with which he plans to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: To buy food such as sugar, rice, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Kapamba Group

texts.en:
Pendo M., who is in her early thirties, is married with three children who attend school.  She has been running a meat butchering business since 2005.  She works from 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a decent profit.

Pendo is requesting a second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan, which she successfully repaid, to buy more meat for her butcher shop.  She will also use this loan to stock up on meat.  Her dream is to one day open another butcher shop.

Pendo will share this loan with her loan group "Kapamba," which has sixteen members who hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.  In the picture, Pendo is in the middle row, third from the left, and wearing black blouse with the beige decoration.

loans.use: to buy more meat for her butcher shop

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is 29 years old; she has two children who are nine and six. They are both in school. Nadia's husband is a driver. 

Nadia owns a general store in which she sells spices, candles, matches, soap and some foodstuffs such as Irish potatoes and sugar; she has had this business for two years. It has allowed her to pay school fees for her children and feed her family as well. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more foodstuffs and make more profits. With the profits she plans to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy food items for her general store

loans.name: Nelgui

texts.es:
Nelgui  es padre de familia de 44 años de edad,  vive en su casa propia con su esposa e hijos, la cual cuenta con servicio agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande a 40 minutos de distancia del departamento de Piura. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Nelgui se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral donde viven sus animales se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con  pastos naturales.  Posteriormente vende sus animales una vez que hayan llegado a su tamaño y peso ideal en los diferentes mercados de la ciudad de de la ciudad de Chiclayo y Lambayeque;  incrementando sus ingresos y obteniendo  cosas que le hacen falta en su hogar.

El crédito que ha solicitado Nelgui es de 500 nuevos soles a Edpyme  Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla, será destinado  para la compra de alimentos balanceados ya que por falta de lluvias en esta zona se ha escaseado el pasto y es necesario comprar otros alimentos complementarios para que sigan engordando y desarrollándose normalmente para poder venderlos a un buen precio en los mercados y así poder pagar su préstamo y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.

Nelgui es una persona trabajadora y empeñosa  que siempre ha sabido salir adelante para mejorar en la vida y brindarles otras oportunidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Nelgui, 44, lives in his own house with his wife and children.  The house has running water and electricity and is located in the district of Tambogrande, 40 minutes away from the department of Piura.  In this area the main activities are agriculture, livestock farming and crafts.

Nelgui raises and sells sheep.  His farmyard is behind his house.  He gives them natural fodder, and once they are ready for market sells them in the cities of Chiclayo and Lambayeque.  This has provided him with income to cover his household expenses.

The loan in the amount of 500 PEN through Edpyme Alternative will be used as seed capital to buy balanced animal feed since there is a scarcity of fodder due to the lack of rain in the area.  He needs to buy complementary feed for the livestock's normal development so he can get a good price at market.  This will enable him to pay back the loan and give his family a better lifestyle.

Nelgui is a very hard worker and intent on getting ahead to lead a better life and provide more opportunities to his children.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed for his sheep.

loans.name: Jeanneth

texts.es: Jeanneth tiene la edad de 43 años, está casada  y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la asistencia de su cafetal y así poder obtener buenas cosechas este año.  Ella cuenta con el terreno sembrado y lo que pretende es mejorar su cosecha tanto en calidad como en cantidad, para así obtener ganancias para seguir adelante con el cultivo y tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Ella quiere llegar a ser una caficultora de la zona de buena producción y ser ejemplo para que las personas no desistan con sus pequeños proyectos. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en: Jeanneth is 43 years old, married, and she lives with her 3 children and their husband. They are her greatest priority. She plans providing maintenance to her coffee plantation in order to obtain a good harvest this year. She has an already planted field and she plans on improving the harvest, in quality and in quantity, to improve her earnings, to move forward with her cultivation, and to improve her quality of life and that of her family. She wants to become a good coffee farmer in the region and to be an example for others, to not give up on their small plantations. this is the second loan she receives from Fudecosur (Kiva Field Partner). She had not had previous loans with state banks but Fudecosur has granted her a loan through an easier process and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase products for her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Dania

texts.es: Dania madre soltera, vive en un barrio, la seguridad y protección es primordial, sus planes preparar a su hijo para un futuro mejor. Tiene un trabajo honesto, humilde de mucho esfuerzo, trabaja como conserje desde hace un gran tiempo y vende productos de una casa comercial productos para damas.  Con la necesidad de mejorar la infraestructura de su casa para ofrecerle mayor comodidad a su familia. Anteriormente presto para ladrillar el piso de la vivienda, a esta altura del camino al mejoramiento está requiriendo construir su cuarto para obtener mayor privacidad y seguridad, con el préstamo comprara cemento, bloques, piedras cantera, hierro, arena, piedrín, lamina de zinc entre otros productos.
texts.en: Dania is a single mother; she lives in a community where safety and security are a top concern. Her plans are to prepare her son for a better future. She has an honest and humble occupation which requires a great deal of effort. She has been working as a janitor for a very long time and she also sells ladies' products from a specific commercial brand. She needs to improve the infrastructure of her home in order to provide her family with greater comfort. She previously borrowed to tile the floors in the house. At this stage of the home improvement project she needs to build a bedroom for greater privacy and security. With the loan she will purchase cement, construction blocks, rocks, steel, sand, gravel, sheets of zinc, and other materials.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Lidier

texts.es: Lidier M. Solís, tiene la edad de 26 años, está casado, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia del tiquizque. El cuenta con el terreno y la experiencia necesario para realizar esta siembra, por lo cual  quiere sembrar una buena cantidad de este cultivo para así obtener ganancias, pues actualmente se encuentra bien pagado. El quiere lograr ganancias para seguir adelante con sus proyectos y darle a su familia una calidad de vida mejor y seguir creciendo como persona y como agricultor. Es el segundo préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Lidier M. Solís is 26 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and two children, who represent his greatest priority in life. He has requested the loan to purchase the necessary materials for growing tequizque. He has the land and experience necessary for growing the plant, of which he wants to grow a substantial quantity to produce a good profit. At present, tequizque commands high prices. He wants to secure a good profit, and thus be able to continue with his projects, offer a better quality of life to his family, and to develop both as a person and farmer. This will be his second loan with FUDECOSUR. He has never had any other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with good conditions and low interest rates.

loans.use: to pay for help and manual labour costs.

loans.name: María Juana

texts.es:
María Juana P. C. tiene 48 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos que son solteros en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 9 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra papas, cebada, habas y habas, tiene cuatro cuadras y media, tiene casa propia y esposo se dedica también a la agricultura tienen tres cabezas de ganado. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar más terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta visitar a la familia, fiestas del 15 de agosto que es la fiesta de María Auxiliadora, el carnaval, la navidad, finados año viejo y semana santa.
texts.en:
María Juana P. C. is 48 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children, who are single, in the Guaranda canton, Bolívar province. She has 9 children.  

The members of the women's group CARBON CHINIPAMBA community bank is found in the Carbón Chinipamba community, in the Cuatro Esquinas area. Cantón Guaranda is 20 minutes from the cooperative office. Most of the members work in agriculture, cattle and trade. Rice, barley, beans. quinoa, potatoes are prodcued as well as milking cows and penned animals.  

María works in farming. She plants potatoes, barley, and beans. She has four and a half lots. She has her own house and her husband is also a farmer. They have three heads of cattle. She makes her purchases in the Guaranda market and sells her product in the wholesale market of the same city.  

She is asking for a loan to buy materials and fees for the animals. The support of the loan will help her financially to meet her needs and face challenges such as pests and weather variation. Her dream is to buy more land to continue planting.  

She likes to visit family during the August 15 festival of María Auxiliadora, as well as during carnival, Christmas, New Year's, and Holy Week.

loans.use: to buy materials and animal feed.

loans.name: María Olga

texts.es:
María Olga C. L. tiene 30 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos todos menores de edad en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura no tiene terrenos propios por lo que arrienda dos cuadras en las que siembra quinua, habas chocho, papas, además tiene tres cabezas de ganado de vacas lecheras, dos cerdos y pollos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar terrenos y comprar una casa en la ciudad de Riobamba para que los hijos vayan a estudiar en esa ciudad.

Le gusta pasear por el pueblo, las fiestas del carnaval, año viejo, las del 15 de agosto de María Auxiliadora.
texts.en:
María Olga C. L. is 30 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and minor children in the Guaranda canton, province of Bolívar. She has 4 children.  

The women's group CARBON CHINIPAMBA community bank is located in the community of Carbón Chinipamba, Cuatro Esquinas area. The Guaranda canton is 20 minutes from the cooperative office. Most of the members work in agriculture, cattle, and trade. They produce rice, barely, beans, quinoa, poatoes as well as animals such as: dairy cows and penned animals.  

María works in agriculture. She does not have her own land, so she rents two lots where she plants quinoa, beans, potatoes, and has three heads of dairy cattle, two pigs and chickens. She makes her purchases in the Guaranda market and sells her product in the wholesale market of the same city.  

She is asking for the loan to buy materials and animal feed. The support of the loan will help her financially to meet her needs and face challenges such as pests and weather variation. Her dream is to buy land and to buy a house in the city of Riobamba so that her children can study in that city.  

She likes to go about town, the carnival festivals, New Year's, and the August 15 festivals of María Auxiliadora.

loans.use: to buy materials and animal feed.

loans.name: Marcia Rosaana

texts.es:
Marcia Rosaana tiene 30 años, es divorciada vive con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

Marcia se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, cebada, a demás tiene chanchos ganado, ovejas y pollos además se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un vehículo, compra de terreno para seguir produciendo.

Le gusta tejer, dedicarse a los hijos, salir de paseo con la familia, año viejo, las del 15 de agosto de María Auxiliadora.
texts.en:
Marcia Rosaana, 30, is divorced and lives with her children in Canton Guaranda, province of Bolivar. She has 3 children. 

The communal bank GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA (CHINIPAMBA COAL WOMEN'S GROUP) is based in the Chinipamba coal community, Canton Guaranda, about 20 minutes from the cooperative office. Most of the partners work in agriculture, livestock and trade, producing rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and raising dairy cows and poultry. 

Marcia works in agriculture. She grows potatoes and barley and she also keeps pigs, sheep and chickens. She also looks after the housework. She does her shopping in the market of Guaranda and sells in the wholesale market of the same city.

She is requesting this loan to buy supplies and animal feed. The loan will help her meet her financial needs. She has to face challenges such as pests and diseases, as well as changes in the weather. Her dream is to buy a vehicle and more farming lands. 

She enjoys knitting, looking after her children, going for walks with her family, New Year's Eve celebrations and the Maria Auxiliadora festivities on 15 August.

loans.use: to buy supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Gloria Grimaneza

texts.es:
Gloria Grimaneza G. C. tiene 28 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con el hijo en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

Gloria se dedica a la agricultura tiene una cuadra y media  que arrienda en la cual siembra cebada, papas, arveja, además cría animales como chanchos, tiene dos cabezas de ganado y ovejas. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un terreno en el sector donde esta arrendando.

Le gusta visitar a los padres, ver televisión, festejar las fiestas del carnaval y las del 15 de agosto de María Auxiliadora.
texts.en:
Gloria Grimaneza G. C. is 28 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and son in the Guaranda canton, Bolívar province. She has 1 child.  

The women's group CARBON CHINIPAMBA community bank is located in the community of Carbón Chinipamba, Cuatro Esquinas sector, Guaranda canton. they are 20 minutes from the cooperative office. Most of the members work in farming, cattle and trade, producing rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and penned animals.  

Gloria is a farmer. She has a lot and a half where she plants barley, potatoes, and peas. She also raises animals such as pigs, and she has two head os cattle and sheep. She makes her purchases in the Guaranda province and sells her product in the wholesale market of the same city.

She is asking for the loan to buy materials and animal feed. The support of the loan will help to meet her needs and face challenges such as pests and illnesses and weather variation. Her dream is to buy a plot of land in the area she is renting.

She likes to visit her parents, watch television, celebrate carnival, and the María Auxiliadora festival on August 15th.

loans.use: to buy materials and animal feed.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
María Concepción T. C. tiene 58 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura tiene dos cuadras de terreno en las cuales siembra papas, maíz, arveja, habas chochos, cebada trigo, melloco, tiene dos cabezas de ganado, cerdos y pollos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar más ganado y un terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta dedicarse a las labores de la casa, (cocinar, lavar), festejar las fiestas del carnaval y las del María Auxiliadora.
texts.en:
Maria Concepcion T. C., 58, lives in Bolivar province with her husband and children.  She has 4 children.

The members of the GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA community bank meet in Carbon Chinipamba, some 20 minutes from our office.  Most of the group's members make a living from farming, raising livestock or running small businesses.  Some grow rice, beans, quinoa, potatoes, etc. and some raise dairy cows and other farm animals.  

Maria farms two parcels of land where she grows potatoes, maize, peas, beans, corn, wheat and other crops.  She also raises cattle, pigs and chickens.  She buys the supplies she needs in the market at Guaranda and sells what she produces in the wholesale market there.  

Maria is applying for a loan to buy animal feed and other supplies she needs for her livestock business.  The loan will help her generate the income she needs to live.  She faces challenges that include crop diseases and poor weather conditions.  She wants to buy more cattle and more land for sowing her crops.

Maria enjoys her daily routine (cooking, washing) and the holidays around Carnaval and the Feast of Maria Auxiliadora.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her livestock business.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El señor Guillermo tiene ya más de seis años dedicándose a su negocio de venta y reparación de llantas para carros. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio ya que le esta haciendo falta herramienta, equipo nuevo y mas variedad de mercancía, son llantas y pegamentos y sellos. 
Pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtendrá de su negocio con la nueva inversión, ya que su esposa la señora Irma Yolanda le ayudara con los gastos familiares con el ingreso que obtiene de sus ventas de productos de belleza para damas.
texts.en: Sr. Guillermo has operated a tire sales and repair business for more than six years.  He is applying for a loan to buy tools, new equipment and a wider range of merchandise--tires, sealants, etc.--that he will resell.  He will repay the loan with the earnings that he generates from his investment in the business.  He can also count on his wife, Irma Yolanda, to help with household expenses because she operates a business of her own, selling women's beauty products.

loans.use: to buy tools and merchandise for his tire sales and repair business.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
María Concepción C. R. tiene 51 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 2 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura tiene cuatro cuadras de terreno propio, siembra papa, habas, quinua cebada, maíz tiene 8 cabezas de ganad, cerdos y borregos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es construir una casa de cemento armado y comprar terreno.

Le gusta tejer, pasear con la familia y festejar todas las fiestas.
texts.en:
Maria Concepcion C. R., 51, lives in Bolivar province with her husband and children.  She has 2 children.

The members of the GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA community bank meet in Carbon Chinipamba, some 20 minutes from our office.  Most of the group's members make a living from farming, raising livestock or running small businesses.  Some grow rice, beans, quinoa, potatoes, etc. and some raise dairy cows and other farm animals.  

Maria farms four parcels of land where she grows potatoes, maize, peas, beans, corn, wheat and other crops.  She also has 8 head of cattle, along with pigs and sheep.  She buys the supplies she needs in the market at Guaranda and sells what she produces in the wholesale market there.  

Maria is applying for a loan to buy animal feed and other supplies she needs for her livestock business.  The loan will help her generate the income she needs to live.  She faces challenges that include crop diseases and poor weather conditions.  She wants to build a solid house of cement and buy more land for sowing her crops.

Maria enjoys knitting, spending time with her family and the celebrating at holidays.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her livestock business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas, cassava, cabbage and spices.

loans.name: María Olga

texts.es:
María Olga tiene 26 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería tiene cuadro cuadras de terreno siembra maíz, habas y cebolla tiene siete cabezas de ganado y ovejas. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar vehículo y comprar más terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta ver novelas, pasear, y tejar.
texts.en:
Maria Olga, 26, is married and lives with her ​​husband  and children in  Canton Guaranda, province of Bolivar. She has 3 children.

The communal bank GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA (CHINIPAMBA COAL WOMEN'S GROUP) is based in the Chinipamba coal community, in Canton Guaranda, about 20 minutes away from the cooperative's office. Most of the partners work in agriculture, livestock and trade, growing rice, barley, beans, quinoa and potatoes and raising animals such as dairy cows and poultry. 

Maria works in agriculture and livestock. She owns four parcels of land and she grows corn, beans and onion. She also has seven heads of cattle and sheep. She does her shopping in Guaranda and sells in the wholesale market of the same city. 

She is requesting this loan to buy supplies and animal feed. The loan will support her financially so she can meet her needs. She faces challenges such as pests, diseases and weather changes. Her dream is to buy a vehicle and buy more land to continue to grow. 

She enjoys reading novels, going for walks and knitting.

loans.use: to buy supplies and animal feed.

loans.name: Nidia Andrea

texts.es:
Nidia madre soltera, su hija le ayudan económicamente. Mujer emprendedora trabaja por cuenta propia teniendo una librería y fotocopiadora desde hace un tiempo, su proyecto es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda para mayor seguridad para su negocio y familia. Inicio con fondos propios, tiene planes de agrandar el negocio ofreciendo otros servicios como fax, acolochado, levantado de texto, variedad de productos.
El préstamo que solicitad será invertido en la compra de laminas de zinc, golosas, reglas de maderas para cambiar el techo de la casa. Agradece a la institución por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Nidia is a single mother whose daughter helps her financially.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who is self employed.  She has owned a stationery store and photocopying business for some time.  Her project is to improve the infrastructure of her home to make her business and family safer.  She started out with her own money and has plans to expand her business, offering other services such as a fax service, a text preparation service and also a variety of products.

The loan that Nidia has requested will be invested in buying metal sheets, bolts and wooden beams to replace her roof.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have given her in developing her business.

loans.use: to replace her roof

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter, tiene la edad de 40 años, está en unión libre  y vive con su hijo y su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de un vehículo. El es vendedor de verduras y quiere ofrecerles a sus clientes un mejor servicio y facilidad para sus clientes. El lo que quiere es tener un mejor vehículo doble tracción para su facilitación y llegar a lugares más difíciles de acceso. El quiere generar las ganancias necesarias para su superación diaria y tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Walter is 40 years old.  He lives with his common-law wife and his son who are his main priorities.  He intends to use his loan to buy a vehicle.  Walter's business is selling vegetables and he would like to be able to offer his customers a better service and make things easier for them.  What he would like is to own a better vehicle with four-wheel drive to make it easier for him to get to places which are more difficult to access.  He would like to make the profits he needs to get ahead on a daily basis and enjoy a better quality of life together with his family.

This is the first loan that Walter has received from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: María Rosa

texts.es:
María Rosa tiene 46 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura tiene cinco cuadras de terreno propio siembra papas, mellocos, trigo, maíz, arveja, tiene tres cabezas de ganado, cerdos y ovejas. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar terrenos por el mismo sector y construir la casa con las ganancias del negocio.-

Le gusta pasear por la ciudad de Guaranda, visitar a la familia y festejar las fiestas.
texts.en:
María Rosa is 46 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.  She has four children.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

María farms crops.  She owns just over six acres (5 'cuadras') of farmland where she grows potatoes, 'melloco' (a native tuber), wheat, corn and peas.  She has three head of cattle, pigs and sheep.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the wholesale market in the same city.

María is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals.  The support of the loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy farmland in her sector and to build a house with the profits from her business.

María enjoys walking through the city of Guaranda, visiting her family and celebrating the fiestas.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es: Maruja tiene 34 años, vive con sus 5 hijos y su esposo en su casa propia. Se dedica a la agricultura desde su niñez, sus padres la enseñaron esta actividad y que hoy se ha convertido en su fuente principal de ingreso económico. Desde entonces ella junto a su esposo e hijos se esfuerzan diariamente para salir adelante, se levantan desde muy temprano para dirigirse a sus campos y cuidar de sus plantaciones; asimismo lleva a sus ovejas que aprovechen en alimentarse de los pastizales que hay en los campos abiertos. Ya cuando muere la tarde regresan a casa para descansar hasta otro día de jornada. Sin embargo menciona que una de las dificultades que se presentan son las continuas lluvias impidiendo que pueda salir a trabajar, pues depende de ello para tener ingresos en su hogar. Su mayor anhelo es seguir adelante teniendo un establo para su animales y tener un almacén donde pueda guardar a sus animales para lo cual seguirá esforzándose y trabajando. Es su segundo crédito número con MFP, el acceder a este aporte significa mucho para ella porque va a mejorar significativamente  en su actividad además de que tiene oportunidades de aprendizaje muy ventajosas para ella y su familia. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de un toro de buena raza para que sea el padrillo para que reproduzcan terneras de calidad.
texts.en:
Maruja is 34 years old and lives with her five children and husband in her own home.  She has been farming since she was a child.  Her parents taught her how to farm and now it has become her main source of income.

Together with her husband and children, Maruja works hard every day to get ahead.  They get up very early and head for their fields to take care of their plantations.  She also takes along her sheep who take advantage of the pasture land which is to be found in the open fields.  When the evening approaches, they return home to rest before the next working day.

Maruja mentions that one of the difficulties that they face is the continual rains which stop them from being able to go out to work.  This is hard because they depend on their farming to make income for their household.  Maruja's greatest wish is to continue getting ahead.  She would like to have a a stable in which to keep her animals and she will continue working hard to achieve this.

This is Maruja's second loan from MFP.  Accessing this loan means a lot to Maruja because she will be able to improve her business a lot.  She will also have opportunities for herself and her family to receive useful training.

Maruja will invest the loan that she is requesting in buying a good breed of bull to serve as a stallion and produce quality calves.

loans.use: to buy a good breed of bull

loans.name: Gladys Piedad

texts.es:
Gladys Piedad  tiene 25 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

Gladys se dedica a la agricultura tiene cuatro cuadras de terreno, tiene casa propia siembra maíz, papas, habas, tiene cuatro cabezas de ganado, cerdos y ovejas. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar vehículo, comprar terreno por Guanujo.

Le gusta dedicarse a los hijos y hacer las labores de la casa.
texts.en:
Gladys Piedad is 25 years old, married, and lives with her husband and three children in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

Gladys farms crops.  She owns just over 4 'cuadras' of farmland (1 cuadra = approx. 6,400m2).  She owns her own home and grows corn, potatoes and beans.  She has four head of cattle, pigs and sheep.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the wholesale market in the same city.

Gladys is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle and to buy land in Guanujo.

Gladys enjoys spending time with her children and looking after her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
María, es comerciante de ropa, junto a su familia conformada por cuatro hijos de 19, 23, 29 y 31 años de edad, todos están solteros y trabajan, ella comercializa la ropa y productos de belleza.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa: interior, blusas, faldas y productos de belleza, esmaltes, bases, maquillaje, lápiz labial, esta inversión le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y generar mejores ganancias.
El objetivo que tiene es comprar un lote para construir una casa propia donde vivir con sus hijos.
texts.en:
María's business is selling clothes and she lives with her family.  She has four children aged 19, 23, 29 and 31.  They are all single and they all work.  María sells clothes and beauty products.

María is requesting a loan to buy clothes (underwear, blouses and skirts) and beauty products (nail polish, foundation, make-up and lipsticks).  This investment will help her to strengthen her business and make better profits.

María's goal is to buy a plot of land so that she can build her own home and live in it with her children.

loans.use: to buy underwear, blouses, skirts and beauty products.

loans.name: Wilson Giovanny

texts.es:
Wilson Giovanny tiene 25 años, es viudo vive con el hijo en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

Wilson se dedica a la agricultura ganadería crianza y engorde de animales como cerdos y ovejas, tiene tres vacas lecheras. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa de cemento armado y comprar un carro para el negocio.

Le gusta hacer deporte, participar en reuniones y ser muy colaborador.
texts.en:
Wilson Giovanny is 25 years old.  He is a widower and lives with his son in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

Wilson raises livestock.  He raises and fattens animals such as pigs and sheep.  He has three dairy cows.  He makes his purchases in Guaranda market and makes his sales in the city's wholesale market.

Wilson is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for his animals.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to own a house made from reinforced concrete and to buy a car for his business.

Wilson enjoys taking part in sports and taking part in meetings.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for his animals

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa, tiene la edad de 49 años, está soltera  y vive con sus 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los pollos para su engorde y también los materiales para el agrandamiento de su local y así poder tener más espacio para el engorde de sus pollos. Ella cuenta con la granja de estos animales y quiere engrandecer sus ventas y producción para así poder abastecer el comercio local. Ella  quiere generar las ganancias para así ir creciendo como productora de carne de pollo  y cada día poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. 

Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Teresa is 49 years old, single, and lives with her two children who are her main priority.  She intends to use her loan to buy chickens to fatten and also materials which she needs to enlarge her premises so that she has more room in which to fatten her chickens.  She has a chicken farm and would like to increase her sales and production so that she can stock the local market.  She would like to make profits so that she can continue to grow as a producer of chicken and be able to provide her children with a better quality of life every day.

This is Teresa's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She hasn't received other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered her this loan with better repayment facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy chickens and building supplies

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa Elvira tiene 41 años, es soltera vive con el hijo y con la madre en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura tiene un solar siembra todo tipo de granos, tiene tres cabezas de ganado, cerdos y ovejas.  Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es que sus hijos terminen de estudiar y comprar un terreno mas grande.

Le gusta hacer las labores del hogar, visitar a los familiares, escuchar música.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira is 41 years old, single, and lives with her son and mother in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

Rosa farms crops.  She has a piece of land where she sows all kinds of grains.  She has three head of cattle, pigs and sheep.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the city's wholesale market.

Rosa is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is for her son to finish school and to buy a larger plot of land.

Rosa enjoys her household chores, visiting her family members and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loans.name: Ronald Ivan

texts.es:
Ronald es padre de familia de 28 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, la cual cuenta con servicio de agua, luz y desagüe, ubicada en el distrito de Chepén a 2 horas de distancia del  departamento de la Libertad.  La actividad que desarrollan sus pobladores es la agricultura,  ganadería y turismo.

Ronald se dedica ha manejar su mototaxi (es un transporte público utilizado por las personas en rutas pequeñas), la cual trabaja en el mismo distrito brindando servicio a las personas mañana y tarde.  Ronald tiene su propia clientela, ésto le permite tener mayores ingresos para poder solventar sus gastos familiares.

A solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para brindarle mantenimiento y cambio de algunos repuestos a su mototaxi, para seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes y obteniendo mejores ingresos para darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.  Ronald es cocnocido por ser una persona  de confianza, servicial, respetuoso y responsable con su clientes que utilizan su transporte, con el objetivo de seguir mejorando en la vida.
texts.en:
Ronald is a 28-year-old father who lives with his parents in a house that does not have running water, electricity or plumbing.  It is located in the district of Chepén, two hours from the department of La Libertad.  The main activities in this area are agriculture, livestock farming and tourism.

Ronald runs a moto-taxi service (public transportation used by people along small routes),  He works mornings and afternoons providing service to people living in the district.  Ronald has his own customer base which allows him to earn a living to cover his family expenses.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 2,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternative to provide repair parts and maintenance for his moto-taxi.  This will allow him to continue providing good service to his customers to increase earnings and give his family a better lifestyle.  Ronald is known as being dependable, service-oriented, respectful and responsible with all the customers he has attracted, in an effort to improve his life.

loans.use: To provide repair parts and maintenance for his moto-taxi.

loans.name: María Laura

texts.es:
María Laura tiene 38 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 7 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura tiene un solar, siembra cebada, papas, maíz, arveja y trigo el terreno es de sus padres tiene seis cabezas de ganado, cerdos, ovejas y pollos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar el estudio a los hijos.

Le gusta escuchar música y visitara los padres.
texts.en:
María Laura is 38 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.  She has seven children.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

María farms crops.  She has a piece of land where she sows all barley, potatoes, corn, peas and wheat.  The land belongs to her parents.  She has six head of cattle, pigs, sheep and chickens.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the city's wholesale market.

María is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to provide her children with an education.

María enjoys listening to music and visiting her parents.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loans.name: María Fabiola

texts.es:
María Fabiola tiene 20 años, es soltera vive con la madre y con un  hijo en  el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C.  GRUPO DE MUJERES CARBON CHINIPAMBA se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad carbón Chinipamba, sector cuatro esquinas Cantón Guaranda a una distancia de 20 minutos de la oficina de la cooperativa, la mayor parte de los socios se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio por lo que produce arroz, cebada, habas quinua, papas y animales de cómo: vacas lecheras y animales de corral.

María se dedica a la agricultura tiene un solar, siembra cebada, papas, maíz, arveja y trigo el terreno es de sus padres tiene seis cabezas de ganado, cerdos, ovejas y pollos. Las compras las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda y las vende en el mercado mayorista de la misma ciudad.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos y alimentación de los animales. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar terrenos y comprar animales.

Le gusta festejar todas las fiestas.
texts.en:
María Fabiola is 20 years old.  She is single and lives with her mother and son in Guaranda canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Grupo de Mujeres Carbon Chinipamba' community bank is located in Carbón Chinipamba neighborhood, in Cuatro Esquinas sector, in Guaranda canton, twenty minutes from Cooperativa's offices.  Most of the members of the bank work in farming, livestock raising and sales.  They produce rice, barley, beans, quinoa, potatoes and animals such as dairy cows and farmyard animals.

María is a farmer.  She has a plot of land where she sows barley, potatoes, corn, peas and wheat.  The land belongs to her parents.  She has six head of cattle, pigs, sheep and chickens.  She makes her purchases in Guaranda market and makes her sales in the city's wholesale market.

María is requesting this loan to buy supplies and feed for her animals.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to provide her children with an education.

María enjoys celebrating fiestas.

loans.use: to buy supplies and feed for her animals

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel,tiene 42 años de edad, vive con su familia, dos hijos de 5 y 7 años y su esposa, desde pequeño Manuel se dedica a la siembra de maíz, el cual cultiva año a año para sostener a su familia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento para las plagas, con esta compra iniciara el proceso del cultivo y espera que un buen cuido tenga al final buena cosecha.
Su aspiración es que a través de su trabajo pueda apoyar a sus hijos y evolucionar económicamente junto a ellos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 42 years old and lives with his family: his two children aged 5 and 7, and his wife.  Manuel has been growing corn since he was a young boy.  He grows it year after year to support his family.

Manuel is currently requesting a loan to buy manure, fertilizers and pest treatments.  With these purchases, he will start growing his crops.  He hopes that taking care of his crops will provide him with a good harvest.

Manuel's goal is, through his work, to support his children and make financial progress.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers and pest treatments.

loans.name: Luz Divina

texts.es:
Luz Divina es una mujer dedicada al oficio de las confecciones y las artesanias en una tierra como Galapa, municipio cercano a Barranquilla, donde es usual esta actividad productiva y se transmite de generación en generación;  Allí en esta población Luz Divina vive con sus 4 hijos en las edades de 10 a 16 años que la impulsan a salir adelante con su microempresa,  pues desea brindarles bienestar y oportunidades educativas. Su negocio inició hace 10 años con la elaboración de vestidos casuales femenino, ropa interior  y gradualmente su mente creativa fue agregándole acabados como pintura en tela y con ello  comenzó su negocio adicional de artesanias en madera country, cuadros decorativos, entre otras manualidads.
